DoubleFace.description: A member of the mafia team but never wakes up with them and always appears as a citizen for the detective.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.
day.effect: Registers vote against the selected player.

Yakuza.description: A member of the mafia. When their role is revealed, they can turn one player into a mafia member, sacrificing themselves.

night.name: Convert
night.description: Turn one player into a mafia member at the cost of your life.
night.effect: Converts the target to a mafia member and eliminates the user.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.
day.effect: Registers vote against the selected player.

MafiaSpecialist.description: If the number of players alive is half or less, they can take on a mafia role that was eliminated previously.

night.name: Revive Mafia
night.description: Assume a mafia role that was eliminated if players alive are half or less.
night.effect: Revives an eliminated mafia role for the target player.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.
day.effect: Registers vote against the selected player.

Butcher.description: Can convert all eliminated mafia members to regular citizens once in the game.

night.name: Convert Mafia
night.description: Convert all eliminated mafia members to citizens.
night.effect: Converts all eliminated mafia members to citizens, usable only once.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.
day.effect: Registers vote against the selected player.

Thief.description: Can steal someone's role and use its ability.

night.name: Steal Role
night.description: Steal a role from another player and use its ability.
night.effect: Steals the target's role and grants its ability for the night.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.
day.effect: Registers vote against the selected player.

Trickster.description: Each night, point to two players. If one is a doctor and the other a detective, the doctor is killed and the detective is saved.

night.name: Trick
night.description: Point to two players; if one is a doctor and one is a detective, apply special effects.
night.effect: If the targets include a doctor and a detective, the doctor is killed and the detective is saved.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.
day.effect: Registers vote against the selected player.

Enchanter.description: Each night, block a player's ability or place a word curse. If the cursed word is used the next day, the player is eliminated.

night.name: Enchant
night.description: Block a player's ability or place a word curse.
night.effect: Blocks the target's ability; if the cursed word is used the following day, the target is eliminated.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.
day.effect: Registers vote against the selected player.

Saboteur.description: Can sabotage a player using a gun. If the sabotaged player shoots, they are killed.

night.name: Sabotage
night.description: Sabotage a player using a gun; if the sabotaged player shoots, they are killed.
night.effect: If the sabotaged player attempts to shoot, they are immediately killed.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.
day.effect: Registers vote against the selected player.

PoisonMaker.description: Can poison one player once per game. The poisoned player is eliminated two days later. Mafia cannot shoot on the night poison is used.

night.name: Poison
night.description: Poison one player; they will be eliminated two days later.
night.effect: Poisons the target so that they are eliminated two days later.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.
day.effect: Registers vote against the selected player.

Spy.description: A mafia member whose allegiance may change if awakened by a Freemason.

night.name: Spy Action
night.description: Perform spy actions; if awakened by a Freemason, switch allegiance.
night.effect: Executes espionage tasks and may change allegiance under specific conditions.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.
day.effect: Registers vote against the selected player.
